translation: Sọ pé: “Mo sá di Olúwa òwúrọ̀ kùtùkùtù
níbi aburú ohun tí Ó dá,[1]
footnotes: 1. Allāhu ni Ẹlẹ́dàá gbogbo n̄ǹkan, ohun rere àti ohun burúkú.

translation: àti níbi aburú òru nígbà tí ó bá ṣóòkùn,
àti níbi aburú àwọn (òpìdán) tó ń fẹnu fátẹ́gùn túẹ́túẹ́ sínú àwọn ońdè,
àti níbi aburú onílara nígbà tí ó bá ṣe ìlara.”
